channel.title: My server will not save..Help?
channel.description:
Well, my server use to be quiet popular til I tried to add a " dragon island". After that it all went downhill. Things started getting worse and worse. People started quitting my server. The server kept crashing. One word can explain it. Ugly.When all hope was lost the worst happened. My server quit saving. I cannt find an auto saver or anything. No one has answered my question. So if you will can you please post any helpful information on how to make the server start saving again? Or what file is corrupt? If you would please leave a response. The rewards will be great from my server.
Thanks, Pwnz0r and the community[br][size=1]Posted on: January 04, 2007, 09:21:08 PM[/size][hr]Is this question to hard for yall? Is that it? If so say so :|

item.title: My server will not save..Help?
item.dc:creator: @superbum1 superbum1
item.description:
@superbum1 wrote:

uhhh yeah get rid of “dragon island” …retard just delete it off everything maybe something u did might have copied over the autosave.java file…somehow

Read full topic

item.title: My server will not save..Help?
item.dc:creator: @vraj82192 vraj82192
item.description:
@vraj82192 wrote:

Re trace your steps? Delete all the things you added when trying to add “Dragon Island”. If that doesn’t work, try posting a picture of what error your getting. Then you can (if you havent make a copy of that CURRENT file, download the same orig. source.) = Make a copy of the file that your using now and download the original source file.=

Comapre both of the files, change the things you changed when adding the “Dragon Island” back to what it was before from looking at the origial one.

Then if that works. Make sure you make a COPY of your WHOLE SOURCE file before trying to do something that big.

Read full topic

item.title: My server will not save..Help?
item.dc:creator: @Jonathan_M Jonathan M
item.description:
@Jonathan_M wrote:

We can’t answer it becauss we don’t have your server or know what the crap it looks like, and we have not had the same problems as you, we cannot answer this problem without your server so i suggest you make a new one, if you are desperate, ask someone who knows about that sorta thing.

Read full topic
